input.sentences: this boy wanted to be a super star
he practiced everyday on the drums
everyday he could play the drums faster and faster
his dad trained him how to play
his sister was jealous of him
output.sentences: Many people want to be a super star, but this boy has more talent than most.
He has practiced every day, working on his talent with the drums.
He enjoys finding new songs to play, working on playing faster and better everyday.
He was trained on how to play by his dad.
His sister is jealous of how good he is.
